I am working in the East Coast of the US... very depressed about the situation... but nothing i can do at the moment.... lost appetite for couple of days...

With a family here, it is impossible to even think about returning to HK

For young people overseas, develop your skills and network in whatever countries you are in now, that is the only way to make HK people stronger and compete with Mainlander on the global stage. We need a team of talent to revive HK!
